Traits.Name: Springing Leap
Traits.Content: El Sombreron can leap up to 20 feet in any direction, allowing it to evade threats and navigate obstacles with ease.

Traits.Name: Hypnotic Presence
Traits.Content: Creatures within 30 feet of El Sombreron that can see it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by it for 1 minute, becoming more susceptible to its enchantments.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: El Sombreron makes two Ensnaring Strikes. If it is engaged with another creature, it can also use its Dream Weaver once.

Actions.Name: Ensnaring Strike
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) psychic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed until the end of their next turn.

Actions.Name: Dream Weaver
Actions.Content: One creature charmed by El Sombreron must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or fall into a deep sleep for 1 minute. While asleep, the target is incapacitated and cannot be awakened by non-magical means. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the sleep on a success.

Actions.Name: Hypnotic Leap
Actions.Content: El Sombreron makes a sudden leap forward, performing a mesmerizing dance. Each creature within 15 feet must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be incapacitated until the start of their next turn. El Sombreron can use this ability once per short rest.
